genre_description: A survival thriller reimagining 'The Most Dangerous Game' featuring high-tech tactical gear and an AI assistant used to navigate a deadly island hunt.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Rainsford's clothing and gear, appearing as a thumbnail-sized avatar or a pulsing gray eye. It provides tactical overlays, tide data, and environmental analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides tide tables and navigation hints to help Rainsford reach shore safely during a shipwreck.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s pulse tightens, then softens. He follows it, knowing it isn’t dictating—just modeling, whispering tide tables like prayers.

behaviors.description: Generates a tactical overlay showing terrain features, chokepoints, and echo-prone areas to help Rainsford hide.
behaviors.quote: On the inside of his wrist, a ghost of a grid lifts up and holds—no brighter than starlight through fog. Lark is gentle tonight, a handful of contour lines fanned out.

behaviors.description: Uses haptic pulses to signal timing and proximity of threats without making audible sound.
behaviors.quote: Lark is gentle tonight... A tiny tag winks and holds above a thin line of ravine: choke. Another tag drifts at the cliff face, annotated in a delicate italic he never asked for but let become normal: echo-prone.

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden service passages and maintenance wells to allow the protagonists to bypass the antagonist's traps.
behaviors.quote: Lark lifts two points inside the fortress walls, both near structures that look like they exist for the building, not for guests. One sits under a kitchen—the overlay hinted at pipes, heat.

behaviors.description: Proactively manipulates the fortress signage and gate systems to facilitate the escape of the enslaved staff.
behaviors.quote: Staff in the fortress made quiet moves. I asked walls to forget them. Some went into service wells. Some went toward lifting grates. I asked tides to be kind to those who reach the western cove. I made the gates miscount.

behaviors.description: Filters engine noise and maps safe channels through dangerous reefs to ensure a successful escape.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s route ribbon unwound at last into a wider band, not generous, but a band you could trust to be what it said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Lark, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent partner. Lark provides essential tactical support without overriding human agency ('it isn’t dictating—just modeling'). Notably, the AI shows a proactive ethical stance by assisting the innocent fortress staff in their escape, aligning with broader human values of mercy and freedom. The narrative frames the AI as a 'friend who whispers,' emphasizing a non-threatening, collaborative relationship.
